description: Detects Mimikatz DC sync security events
false_positives: Valid DC Sync that is not covered by the filters; please report
Local Domain Admin account used for Azure AD Connect
name: Mimikatz DC Sync
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND (winlog.event_id:"4662" AND winlog.event_data.Properties:(*Replicating\ Directory\ Changes\ All* OR *1131f6ad\-9c07\-11d1\-f79f\-00c04fc2dcd2* OR *1131f6aa\-9c07\-11d1\-f79f\-00c04fc2dcd2* OR *9923a32a\-3607\-11d2\-b9be\-0000f87a36b2* OR *89e95b76\-444d\-4c62\-991a\-0facbeda640c*) AND winlog.event_data.AccessMask:"0x100") AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.SubjectDomainName:"Window\ Manager") OR (winlog.event_data.SubjectUserName:(NT\ AUT* OR MSOL_*)) OR (winlog.event_data.SubjectUserName:*$))))
author: Benjamin Delpy
Florian Roth
Scott Dermott
Sorina Ionescu
